title: High Malaria Incidence
description: In 2023, Benin recorded a malaria incidence rate of 363.4 cases per 1,000 population at risk, one of the highest in the world.

title: Low Diabetes Prevalence
description: As of 2021, only 1.1% of Benin's population aged 20 to 79 were affected by diabetes, marking one of the lowest prevalence rates globally.

title: Limited Access to Sanitation Services
description: In 2022, only 2.7% of Benin's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, highlighting a significant area for improvement.
